verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Now<WH6258> you shall see<WH7200> what<WH834> I will do<WH6213> to Pharaoh;<WH6547> for under compulsion<WH2389> <WH3027> he shall let<WH7971> them go,<WH7971> and under compulsion<WH2389> <WH3027> he shall drive<WH1644> them out of his land.<WH776>"
God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> further to Moses<WH4872> and said<WH559> to him, "I am the Lord;<WH3068>
and I appeared<WH7200> to Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and Jacob,<WH3290> as God<WH410> Almighty,<WH7706> but [by] My name,<WH8034> Lord,<WH3068> I did not make<WH3045> Myself known<WH3045> to them.
"And I also<WH1571> established<WH6965> My covenant<WH1285> with them, to give<WH5414> them the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> the land<WH776> in which<WH834> they sojourned.<WH1481>

"And furthermore<WH1571> I have heard<WH8085> the groaning<WH5009> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> because<WH834> the Egyptians<WH4714> are holding<WH5647> them in bondage;<WH5647> and I have remembered<WH2142> My covenant.<WH1285>

"Say,<WH559> therefore,<WH3651> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> 'I am the Lord,<WH3068> and I will bring<WH3318> you out from under<WH8478> the burdens<WH5450> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and I will deliver<WH5337> you from their bondage.<WH5656> I will also redeem<WH1350> you with an outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220> and with great<WH1419> judgments.<WH8201>

'Then I will take<WH3947> you for My people,<WH5971> and I will be your God;<WH430> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought<WH3318> you out from under<WH8478> the burdens<WH5450> of the Egyptians.<WH4714>

'And I will bring<WH935> you to the land<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH5375> <WH3027> to give<WH5414> to Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and Jacob,<WH3290> and I will give<WH5414> it to you [for] a possession;<WH4181> I am the Lord.<WH3068>' "

So Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> thus<WH3651> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> but they did not listen<WH8085> to Moses<WH4872> on account<WH4480> of [their] despondency<WH7115> <WH7307> and cruel<WH7186> bondage.<WH5656>
Now the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Go,<WH935> tell<WH1696> Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> to let<WH7971> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go<WH7971> out of his land.<WH776>"

But Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2005> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> have not listened<WH8085> to me; how<WH349> then will Pharaoh<WH6547> listen<WH8085> to me, for I am unskilled<WH6189> in speech<WH8193>?"

Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> and gave<WH6680> them a charge<WH6680> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> to bring<WH3318> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

These<WH428> are the heads<WH7218> of their fathers' households.<WH1004> The sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> Israel's first-born: Hanoch<WH2585> and Pallu,<WH6396> Hezron<WH2696> and Carmi;<WH3756> these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of Reuben.<WH7205>

And the sons<WH1121> of Simeon:<WH8095> Jemuel<WH3223> and Jamin<WH3226> and Ohad<WH161> and Jachin<WH3199> and Zohar<WH6714> and Shaul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of a Canaanite<WH3669> woman;<WH3669> these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of Simeon.<WH8095>

And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> according to their generations:<WH8435> Gershon<WH1648> and Kohath<WH6955> and Merari;<WH4847> and the length<WH8141> of Levi's life<WH9132> was one hundred<WH3967> and thirty-seven years.<WH8141>
The sons<WH1121> of Gershon:<WH1648> Libni<WH3845> and Shimei,<WH8096> according to their families.<WH4940>

And the sons<WH1121> of Kohath:<WH6955> Amram<WH6019> and Izhar<WH3324> and Hebron<WH9116> and Uzziel;<WH5816> and the length<WH8141> of Kohath's life<WH9132> was one hundred<WH3967> and thirty-three years.<WH8141>
And the sons<WH1121> of Merari:<WH4847> Mahli<WH4249> and Mushi.<WH4187> These<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3881> according to their generations.<WH8435>

And Amram<WH6019> married<WH3947> <WH802> his father's sister<WH1733> Jochebed,<WH3115> and she bore<WH3205> him Aaron<WH175> and Moses;<WH4872> and the length<WH8141> of Amram's life<WH9132> was one hundred<WH3967> and thirty-seven years.<WH8141>
And the sons<WH1121> of Izhar:<WH3324> Korah<WH7141> and Nepheg<WH5298> and Zichri.<WH2147>
And the sons<WH1121> of Uzziel:<WH5816> Mishael<WH4332> and Elzaphan<WH469> and Sithri.<WH5644>

And Aaron<WH175> married<WH3947> <WH802> Elisheba,<WH472> the daughter<WH1323> of Amminadab,<WH5992> the sister<WH269> of Nahshon,<WH5177> and she bore<WH3205> him Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu,<WH30> Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar.<WH385>
And the sons<WH1121> of Korah:<WH7141> Assir<WH617> and Elkanah<WH511> and Abiasaph;<WH23> these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Korahites.<WH7145>

And Aaron's son<WH1121> Eleazar<WH499> married<WH3947> <WH802> one<WH4480> of the daughters<WH1323> of Putiel,<WH6317> and she bore<WH3205> him Phinehas.<WH6372> These<WH428> are the heads<WH7218> of the fathers' [households] of the Levites<WH3881> according to their families.<WH4940>

It was [the same] Aaron<WH175> and Moses<WH4872> to whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> said,<WH559> "Bring<WH3318> out the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> according<WH5921> to their hosts.<WH6635>"

They were the ones who spoke<WH1696> to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> about bringing<WH3318> out the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from Egypt;<WH4714> it was [the same] Moses<WH4872> and Aaron.<WH175>
Now it came<WH1961> about on the day<WH3117> when the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714>
that the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> "I am the Lord;<WH3068> speak<WH1696> to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> all<WH3605> that I speak<WH1696> to you."
But Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2005> I am unskilled<WH6189> in speech;<WH8193> how<WH349> then will Pharaoh<WH6547> listen<WH8085> to me?"
